title: I have a question about my account.
body: I mad a post but it was deleted. It was about my account been hacked today. I already submitted a ticked about it but it was under "I need help recovering my account" but the person from RiotGames who deleted my post suggested the ticket to be under “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and the thing is that I cant get login to make another report about it under that because the person who hacked me changed my password and email and i can't recover it. So my question is if my request is still going to be evaluated even though it was requested under "I need help recovering my account" ?

replies.body:
Yes, your ticket will still be received and addressed by a specialist regardless of the category you selected. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
